# Supplementary material and example code for the UBY tutorial 2013:
# The Practitioner's Cookbook for Linked Lexical Resources

= The Practitioner's Cookbook for Linked Lexical Resources - Training Content =

== Step-by-step Instructions for the Setup ==

Import a UBY database dump into a MySQL database
  * [http://code.google.com/p/uby/wiki/DbImportTutorial How to import a UBY database dump (uby@Google Code)]

Installing Eclipse
   * [EclipseInstallationAndSetup Eclipse Installation and Setup]

Maven Guidelines
   * Connecting to Maven repositories, [http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl/wiki/UkpMavenRepository UKP Public Maven Repository]


Check out the tutorial project in Eclipse:
  * Eclipse -> Window -> Open Perspective -> Other -> SVN Repository Exploring -> Add SVN Repository
  * Give the URL of the repository
  * Right click on the trunk/tag/branch of the project you want to checkout -> Check out as Maven Project (do not rename the project)
